alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Fulton; Marshall; Miami; Northern La Porte; Pulaski; Starke; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 12:55AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Joseph, Fulton, eastern Pulaski, northwestern Miami, eastern Starke, Marshall, northeastern La Porte and southeastern Berrien Counties through 130 AM EDT/1230 AM CDT/... At 1254 AM EDT/1154 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near North Liberty to 9 miles southwest of Winamac. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... North Liberty around 100 AM EDT. South Bend and Winamac around 105 AM EDT. Gulivoire Park and Lakeville around 110 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Roseland, Mishawaka, Osceola and Rochester. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 60 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Fulton; Marshall; Miami; Northern La Porte; Pulaski; Starke; Western St. Joseph
